text:
servlet "/reqdisp" calls a request disapcher (named rd) has name 
commencing 'admin' which uses 

RequestDispatcher rd = req.getRequestDispatcher("/admin");
rd.include(req, resp);

A filter has been mapped to /admin:

   <filter-mapping>
        <filter-name>DispatcherFilterIcd</filter-name>
        <url-pattern>/admin</url-pattern>
        <dispatcher>INCLUDE</dispatcher>
   </filter-mapping>

but when request /reqdisp, the filter does not work (it has been initialized).
creator: jian.cai@sun.com

text:
In the lastest Integration with J2EE RI, this problem occured again. It was 
fixed before
creator: jian.cai@sun.com
amyroh@apache.org
text:
Can you see if this works with the latest update of web-app_2_4.xsd?  The new 
web-app_2_4.xsd is checked into the cvs.

creator: bob@jadn.com
text: Hey, Is anybody looking at this? (my guess, no.)   I am starting to look into it.
